descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kevin Durant goes right down the middle of the paint and takes off to throw down an emphatic dunk early in the first quarter against the Spurs.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD slices and slams vs. Spurs) 2021/05/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD slices and slams vs. Spurs

videos.description: DeMar DeRozan is somehow able to drop in a rainbow and-1 bucket after he uses a fake to draw the contact and get his defender in the air.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (DeRozan makes wild and-1 shot) 2021/05/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: DeRozan makes wild and-1 shot

videos.description: Landry Shamet darts a pass to a cutting Blake Griffin on the baseline for a powerful flush inside for between defenders.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Shamet finds Griffin for the slam) 2021/05/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Shamet finds Griffin for the slam

videos.description: James Harden throws an overhead bounce pass between four Spurs defenders to a streaking Jeff Green for an easy two-handed dunk in transition.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden's sweet dime sets up Green's easy dunk) 2021/05/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden's sweet dime sets up Green's easy dunk

videos.description: James Harden says he's not surprised that he played well in his return to the Nets' lineup because he's "really good at this game" and has a great feel for his teammates and coaches.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Presser (Harden: 'I'm really good at this game') 2021/05/12

videos.headline: Harden: 'I'm really good at this game'
